response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. I believe it's worth more than its cost and can significantly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and benefits, I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects the value I see in the product and my desire to make it accessible to someone who appreciates it as much as I do. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and needs.", "product_price": 120}
